methods.name: GetCustomComputeWeightedNormals
methods.doc: Query whether normals are recomputed by weighting the surface area and the corner angle of the triangle as a ratio.

methods.name: GetCustomKeepSectionsSeparate
methods.doc: Query whether sections with matching materials are kept separate and will not get combined.

methods.name: GetCustomLODGroup
methods.doc: Query whether a custom LOD group is set for the mesh.

methods.name: GetCustomRecomputeNormals
methods.doc: Query whether normals in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed. When normals are recomputed, the tangents are also recomputed.

methods.name: GetCustomRecomputeTangents
methods.doc: Query whether tangents in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed.

methods.name: GetCustomRemoveDegenerates
methods.doc: Query whether degenerate triangles are removed.

methods.name: GetCustomUseBackwardsCompatibleF16TruncUVs
methods.doc: Query whether UVs are converted to 16-bit by a legacy truncation process instead of the default rounding process. This may avoid differences when reimporting older content.

methods.name: GetCustomUseFullPrecisionUVs
methods.doc: Query whether UVs are stored at full floating point precision.

methods.name: GetCustomUseHighPrecisionTangentBasis
methods.doc: Query whether tangents are stored at 16-bit precision instead of the default 8-bit precision.

methods.name: GetCustomUseMikkTSpace
methods.doc: Query whether tangents are recomputed using MikkTSpace when they need to be recomputed.

methods.name: GetCustomVertexColorIgnore
methods.doc: Query whether the static mesh factory should ignore the vertex color. Return false if the attribute was not set.

methods.name: GetCustomVertexColorOverride
methods.doc: Query whether the static mesh factory should override the vertex color. Return false if the attribute was not set.

methods.name: GetCustomVertexColorReplace
methods.doc: Query whether the static mesh factory should replace the vertex color. Return false if the attribute was not set.

methods.name: GetLodDataCount
methods.doc: Return the number of LODs this static mesh has.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencies
methods.doc: Retrieve the correspondence table between slot names and assigned materials for this object.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Retrieve the Material dependency for the specified slot of this object.

methods.name: RemoveSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Remove the Material dependency associated with the specfied slot name of this object.

methods.name: ResetSlotMaterialDependencies
methods.doc: Reset all the material dependencies.

methods.name: SetCustomComputeWeightedNormals
methods.doc: Set whether normals are recomputed by weighting the surface area and the corner angle of the triangle as a ratio.

methods.name: SetCustomKeepSectionsSeparate
methods.doc: Set whether sections with matching materials are kept separate and will not get combined.

methods.name: SetCustomLODGroup
methods.doc: Set a custom LOD group for the mesh.

methods.name: SetCustomRecomputeNormals
methods.doc: Set whether normals in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed. When normals are recomputed, the tangents are also recomputed.

methods.name: SetCustomRecomputeTangents
methods.doc: Set whether tangents in the imported mesh are ignored and recomputed.

methods.name: SetCustomRemoveDegenerates
methods.doc: Set whether degenerate triangles are removed.

methods.name: SetCustomUseBackwardsCompatibleF16TruncUVs
methods.doc: Set whether UVs are converted to 16-bit by a legacy truncation process instead of the default rounding process. This may avoid differences when reimporting older content.

methods.name: SetCustomUseFullPrecisionUVs
methods.doc: Set whether UVs are stored at full floating point precision.

methods.name: SetCustomUseHighPrecisionTangentBasis
methods.doc: Set whether tangents are stored at 16-bit precision instead of the default 8-bit precision.

methods.name: SetCustomUseMikkTSpace
methods.doc: Set whether tangents are recomputed using MikkTSpace when they need to be recomputed.

methods.name: SetCustomVertexColorIgnore
methods.doc: Set whether the static mesh factory should ignore the vertex color. Return false if the attribute could not be set.

methods.name: SetCustomVertexColorOverride
methods.doc: Set whether the static mesh factory should override the vertex color. Return false if the attribute could not be set.

methods.name: SetCustomVertexColorReplace
methods.doc: Set whether the static mesh factory should replace the vertex color. Return false if the attribute could not be set.

methods.name: SetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Add a Material dependency to the specified slot of this object.
